Articles.Content:
I probably should have introduced myself here prior to posting a challenge, but as a long-time lurker I already felt at home.

Anyway, brilliant game, great community. At 500+ hours in on KSP, I'm still discovering endless possibilities. 10/10 would blow up on launch again

Hi there Gojira1000

Yesterday i accomplished a crazy cool challenge from a guy called Gojira1000... oh wait ... yeah hi gojira1000!

You again!
Hi! I haven't tried the challenge, but don't worry- my first post was in Forum Games, not here.
